issue.title: Intensities of laser scan is too big

content.raw:
Please launch this.
I'm sorry, but I don't know how to spawn sensor model only.
```
<launch>
  <include file="$(find pr2_gazebo)/launch/pr2_empty_world.launch" />
  <node name="spawn_table" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="spawn_model" output="screen"
        args="-sdf -database table -model table_model -x 1.1 -y -0.0 -z -0.4 -R 0.0 -P 0.0 -Y 1.57" />

</launch>
```
content.html:
Please launch this. I'm sorry, but I don't know how to spawn sensor model only.

<launch>
  <include file="$(find pr2_gazebo)/launch/pr2_empty_world.launch" />
  <node name="spawn_table" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="spawn_model" output="screen"
        args="-sdf -database table -model table_model -x 1.1 -y -0.0 -z -0.4 -R 0.0 -P 0.0 -Y 1.57" />

</launch>
